author: bridge-bot
content: <fede_intern> thanks for updating ethrex, ethereum will win!

author: bridge-bot
content: <jrchatruc> hey, just a heads up, we are adopting the reth's p50 and p99 metrics using the metrics-exporter-prometheus library, which doesn't really show live data for every block but rather some processed moving average (you can see in the graph those latency peaks on nethermind, we have similar peaks as well, but they are "hidden" by the metric)
